title: Pantry Closet, Gas Fireplaces in Many Models, Pet Friendly
posting_body: ['Located in Southfield, Michigan, Radius at Ten Mile is a beautiful community that you would be proud to call home.', 'Our exceptional apartments and impressive community amenities paired with our gracious team will surpass all of your expectations.', 'Property Amenities:', 'Spacious 1 BR, 2BR & 2 BR-plus Loft Apartments 1-2 ½ Baths', 'Quartz Kitchen Countertops', 'Spacious 9’ Ceilings with Open Concept Floorplans', 'GOFit Fitness Center', 'Hotel Style Card Access Security Lock at Apartment Entry', 'Gas Fireplaces in Many Models', 'Modern Backsplash', 'Prime Location', 'Online Resident Portal', 'Full Size Gas Stackable Washer/Dryer in Apartments', 'Exterior Vented Kitchen Exhaust', 'Swimming Pool', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of your exact home.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!', 'Professionally managed by GoldOller Real Estate Investments, a provider of Fair Housing and Equal Opportunity.']
